mapper.select: delete from `wk_work_task_relation` where task_id in (select task_id from `wk_work_task` where work_id = #{workId})
mapper.update: update `wk_work_task` set owner_user_id = replace(owner_user_id,concat(',',#{userId},','),',') where work_id = #{workId} and owner_user_id like concat(',',#{userId},',')
mapper.select:
select a.work_id,a.name,a.owner_user_id,a.color,0 as collect,999 as orderNum, a.is_system_cover,cover_url,a.is_open,a.create_user_id,a.owner_role,a.batch_id, a.description from wk_work as a where a.status = 1
and ((a.owner_user_id like concat('%,',#{userId},',%') and a.is_open = 0) or a.is_open = 1)
and (a.name like concat('%',#{data.name},'%') or a.description like concat('%',#{data.name},'%'))
and to_days(a.create_time) = to_days(now())
and yearweek(a.create_time) = yearweek(now())-1
and month(a.create_time) = month(now())-1
and year(a.create_time) = year(now())-1
and a.create_time >= #{data.startTime}
and a.create_time <= #{data.endTime}
order by a.create_time asc
order by a.create_time desc
order by a.update_time desc
select class_id, name as class_name from `wk_work_task_class` where work_id = #{taskId} order by order_num

select a.*,ifnull(b.class_id,-1) as classId,b.order_num as classOrder, d.customer_ids,d.contacts_ids,d.business_ids,d.contract_ids, (select count(*) from wk_work_task_comment where type_id = a.task_id and type = 1) as commentCount, e.childWCCount,e.childAllCount from wk_work_task a left join wk_work_task_class b on a.class_id = b.class_id left join wk_work_task_relation as d on a.task_id = d.task_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) as childAllCount,COUNT(status=5 or null) as childWCCount,pid FROM wk_work_task GROUP BY pid ) as e on e.pid = a.task_id where a.work_id = #{data.workId} and a.status != 3 and a.ishidden = 0 and is_archive = 0
and a.class_id = #{classId}
and
a.owner_user_id like concat('%,',#{userId},',%') or a.main_user_id = #{userId}
and
a.label_id like concat('%,',#{labelId},',%')
and case #{data.stopTimeType} when 1 then date_format(a.stop_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') when 2 then date_format(a.stop_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') when 3 then YEARWEEK(date_format(a.stop_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) when 4 then date_format(a.stop_time,'%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) when 5 then a.stop_time is null when 6 then a.stop_time < now() when 7 then date_format(a.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') end
and (a.name like concat('%',#{data.taskName},'%') or a.description like concat('%',#{data.taskName},'%'))
order by a.create_time desc
order by a.stop_time desc
order by a.update_time desc
order by a.priority desc
select user_id,img,realname from wk_admin_user where user_id in (select main_user_id from wk_work_task where ishidden = 0 and work_id > 0)
select work_id from wk_work where (owner_user_id like concat('%,',#{userId},',%') and is_open = 0) or is_open = 1

select count(case when status = 5 then 1 else null end ) as complete,count(case when status != 5 then 1 else null end ) as undone from wk_work_task where class_id = #{classId} and work_id = #{workId} and ishidden = 0 and (is_archive = 0 or (is_archive = 1 and status = 5))
select label_id,status from wk_work_task where work_id = #{workId} and label_id is not null and ishidden = 0 and (is_archive = 0 or (is_archive = 1 and status = 5))

select a.*,b.name as workName,d.customer_ids,d.contacts_ids,d.business_ids,d.contract_ids, (select count(*) from wk_work_task_comment where type_id = a.task_id and type = 1) as commentCount, (select count(*) from wk_work_task where pid = a.task_id and status = 5) as childWCCount, (select count(*) from wk_work_task where pid = a.task_id) as childAllCount from wk_work_task a left join wk_work b on a.work_id = b.work_id left join wk_work_task_relation as d on a.task_id = d.task_id where a.work_id = #{workId} and a.is_archive = 1 and a.ishidden = 0
select b.realm from wk_admin_role_menu as a left join wk_admin_menu as b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id where a.role_id = #{roleId} and b.parent_id = #{parentId}

select a.user_id,b.realname,a.role_id,c.role_name,b.img from wk_work_user as a left join wk_admin_user as b on a.user_id = b.user_id left join wk_admin_role as c on a.role_id = c.role_id where a.work_id = #{workId}
select a.role_name from wk_admin_role as a where a.role_id = #{roleId}

#{id}
and
a.owner_user_id like concat('%,',#{userId},',%') or a.main_user_id = #{userId}
and
a.label_id like concat('%,',#{labelId},',%')
and to_days(a.create_time) = to_days(now())
and yearweek(a.create_time) = yearweek(now())-1
and month(a.create_time) = month(now())-1
and year(a.create_time) = year(now())-1

order by a.update_time desc
order by a.priority desc

select a.owner_user_id from wk_work_task a left join wk_work b on a.work_id = b.work_id left join wk_work_task_relation as d on a.task_id = d.task_id where a.ishidden = 0 and (a.status = 1 or a.status = 2 or a.status = 5) and a.is_archive = 0 and (a.owner_user_id like concat('%,',#{userId},',%') or a.main_user_id = #{userId}) and a.pid = 0

select a.task_id,a.name,a.description,a.start_time,a.stop_time,a.create_time, a.create_user_id, a.main_user_id, (CASE WHEN a.priority = 0 THEN '无' WHEN a.priority = 1 THEN '低' WHEN a.priority = 2 THEN '中' WHEN a.priority = 3 THEN '高' END ) as priority, e.name as class_name, a.owner_user_id, a.label_id, d.customer_ids, d.contacts_ids, d.business_ids, d.contract_ids from wk_work_task as a left join wk_work_task_relation as d on a.task_id = d.task_id left join wk_work_task_class as e on a.class_id = e.class_id where a.work_id = #{workId} and a.pid = 0 and a.ishidden = 0 and a.status in (1,2,5) and a.is_archive = 0 order by e.order_num,a.order_num
